updates.title: Additive Forge
updates.content:
- Score screen on retreat.
- Anvilomancer now converts some weapon upgrades to permanent upgrades on retreat.
- Fruit can only be purchased at the vendor by the dungeon entrance.
- Buffed Clockomancer's ability.
- Regeneration rate is displayed in health bar.
- Wayfinder can't be accidentally (or otherwise) removed at campfires.
- Better precision for speedrun timer.

updates.title: Quality of Life Improvements
updates.content:
- Display base and current damage/duration values for abilities on the Band page.
- Display possible routes on the map.
- The HP bar floats with you if you scroll down when you have a lot of abilities.
- The last clicked button is held down automatically.
- Fixed UI scaling on iPhones.
